section.title: Enums
section.para: This section describes the enums of the model.

section.title: Alignment
section.para: The alignment of an element.

tgroup.tbody:
The alignment of an element.
LEFT 1 Align to the left.
CENTER
Align to the center.
RIGHT 2 Align to the right.
TOP 3 Align to the top.
BOTTOM 4 Align to the bottom.

section.title: Classes
section.para: This sections describes the classes of the model.

row.entry: The size as intended by the designer. May be used for layouting as preferred size.
